description: This is the master list of all universal tags used in the VTM Character Generator. All data files (concepts, clans, disciplines, etc.) must use the 'id' from this list for their tag and affinity definitions.

tags.name: Physical
tags.description: Represents the primary category for physical Attributes (Strength, Dexterity, Stamina) and related physical challenges.

tags.name: Social
tags.description: Represents the primary category for social Attributes (Charisma, Manipulation, Appearance) and social interactions.

tags.name: Mental
tags.description: Represents the primary category for mental Attributes (Perception, Intelligence, Wits) and intellectual challenges.

tags.name: Strength
tags.description: Directly relates to the Strength attribute, representing raw physical power.

tags.name: Dexterity
tags.description: Directly relates to the Dexterity attribute, representing agility, speed, and precision.

tags.name: Stamina
tags.description: Directly relates to the Stamina attribute, representing health, toughness, and resilience.

tags.name: Charisma
tags.description: Directly relates to the Charisma attribute, representing charm, leadership, and likability.

tags.name: Manipulation
tags.description: Directly relates to the Manipulation attribute, representing the ability to influence or trick others.

tags.name: Appearance
tags.description: Directly relates to the Appearance attribute, representing physical attractiveness and presence.

tags.name: Perception
tags.description: Directly relates to the Perception attribute, representing awareness and sensory acuity.

tags.name: Intelligence
tags.description: Directly relates to the Intelligence attribute, representing memory, reason, and analytical thought.

tags.name: Wits
tags.description: Directly relates to the Wits attribute, representing quick thinking and improvisation.

tags.name: Talents
tags.description: Represents the category for innate, instinctual Abilities.

tags.name: Skills
tags.description: Represents the category for trained, practical Abilities.

tags.name: Knowledges
tags.description: Represents the category for learned, academic Abilities.

tags.name: Combat
tags.description: Encompasses all forms of physical conflict and fighting.

tags.name: Brawling
tags.description: Relates to unarmed, raw, and often brutal combat.

tags.name: Melee
tags.description: Relates to combat using handheld weapons like knives or swords.

tags.name: Firearms
tags.description: Relates to the use of ranged, projectile weapons.

tags.name: Athleticism
tags.description: Involves physical movement like running, jumping, and climbing.

tags.name: Deception
tags.description: Encompasses acts of lying, subterfuge, disguise, and misleading others.

tags.name: Intimidation
tags.description: Involves inspiring fear through threats or sheer presence.

tags.name: Leadership
tags.description: Relates to commanding, inspiring, and directing others.

tags.name: Investigation
tags.description: Involves gathering clues, solving puzzles, and uncovering secrets.

tags.name: Stealth
tags.description: Involves moving unseen, hiding, and acting without being noticed.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Relates to enduring harsh environments and living off the land.

tags.name: Technology
tags.description: Involves using and manipulating computers and modern electronics.

tags.name: Medical
tags.description: Relates to healing, anatomy, and diagnosing illnesses or injuries.

tags.name: Scholar
tags.description: Involves academic research, deep knowledge, and intellectual pursuits.

tags.name: Performance
tags.description: Encompasses acting, singing, public speaking, or any form of artistic expression.

tags.name: Control
tags.description: Represents abilities that control the minds or actions of others, like Dominate.

tags.name: Illusion
tags.description: Represents abilities that manipulate reality or create false perceptions, like Chimerstry.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Represents abilities that alter the user's physical form, like Protean or Vicissitude.

tags.name: Supernatural Perception
tags.description: Represents heightened or unnatural senses, like Auspex.

tags.name: Blood Magic
tags.description: Represents the arcane art of blood sorcery, primarily Thaumaturgy.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: Represents power over the dead, souls, and the underworld.

tags.name: Primal
tags.description: Relates to the animalistic, instinctual, and savage nature of the Beast.

tags.name: Arcane
tags.description: Relates to occult knowledge, esoteric lore, and magical secrets.

tags.name: Frenzy
tags.description: Relates to the Beast taking over and losing control.

tags.name: Morality
tags.description: Concerns Humanity, Paths of Enlightenment, and the struggle against the Beast.

tags.name: Willpower
tags.description: Represents mental fortitude, determination, and focus.

tags.name: Blood
tags.description: Relates to vitae, feeding, blood bonds, and the core of vampiric power.

tags.name: High Society
tags.description: Involves the world of the wealthy, influential, and powerful mortals.

tags.name: Underworld
tags.description: Concerns the criminal element, street life, and illegal activities.

tags.name: Influence
tags.description: Represents a character's pull in mortal society (political, financial, etc.).

tags.name: Resources
tags.description: Represents a character's material wealth and assets.

tags.name: Information
tags.description: Involves networks of spies, secrets, and access to knowledge.

tags.name: Allies
tags.description: Represents loyal friends, companions, and helpers.

tags.name: Streetwise
tags.description: Represents knowledge of the streets, its people, and its unspoken rules.

tags.name: Bureaucracy
tags.description: Involves navigating institutions, corporations, and official channels.
